ISSUE.TITLE: typo in CI github action code
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link https://supabase.com/docs/guides/cli/managing-environments ## Describe the problem There's a missing "!" in the if expression or the "ci.yaml" github action code, highlighted below. It should be: ` if ! git diff --ignore-space-at-eol --exit-code --quiet types.gen.ts; then` As on [the example repo](https://github.com/supabase/supabase-action-example/blob/main/.github/workflows/ci.yaml).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: truncation while impersonating roles (#20349) fix: truncation while impersonating

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update managing-environments.mdx Fix for the issue #20322
